name: Entire Shrek movie chart for Friday Night Funkin'
name_original: Entire Shrek movie chart for Friday Night Funkin'
description:
So yeah, did this because of someone probably jokingly asking when are we getting a Shrek movie chart in reply of a tweet of someone asking if they were the first one to ever watch a movie in FNF ( with Psych Engine video code stuff ), but I came in, and y'know. 

Took nearly an entire month, and somehow noticed that the homophobic f slur was in the movie, and I was the only one who noticed lmfaoo

Anyway yeah, finally finished with this masterpiece. Now the longest FNF mod ever, surpassing DDLC Takeover just by mostly one person. 

Have fun.
